en-US.summary: A sample skill that demonstrates the use of EdgeTTS (Liam Neural voice) in place of Alexa's default voice.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell Custom T.T.S. to say something
Alexa tell Custom T.T.S. to motivate me
en-US.name: Custom TTS Voice
en-US.description: A sample skill that demonstrates the use of Microsoft EdgeTTS with custom voices (like Liam Neural) in place of Alexa's default voice.
